Utangulizi.content:
**Mtoto wako sasa ni shujaa mdogo** – anacheza, anasoma, anafikiri, anacheka. Miaka 5 hadi 7 ni wakati **ubongo unakua kwa kasi**, mifupa inaimarika, na kinga inajengwa. Chakula sio tu kumshibisha – ni **dawa ya asili** ya akili, afya, na furaha.

![Child Eating with Joy](https://www.cdc.gov/nutrition/images/school-age-child-eating-joyfully.jpg)

### Mama, Baba – Hii Ndiyo Faida ya Kula Vizuri
1. **Akili inayofikiri haraka** – Iron na DHA husaidia kumbukumbu
2. **Kinga kama simba** – Vitamin C na Zinc hupunguza homa
3. **Mifupa kama mwalimu** – Calcium na Vitamin D
4. **Uzito wa kawaida** – 18–25 kg
5. **Kujifunza shuleni** – B-vitamins husaidia umakini
6. **Tabia ya kupendeza** – Omega-3 hupunguza hasira
7. **Meno yanayotabasamu** – Fluoride na calcium
8. **Kulinda dhidi ya unene** – Fiber na mazoezi
9. **Kujiamini** – Anajisaidia kula, anachagua vizuri
10. **Furaha ya nyumbani** – Kula pamoja ni upendo

### Malengo Yetu Pamoja
- **Chakula cha familia** chenye rangi na ladha
- **Maziwa 400ml/siku** (maziwa, yogurt)
- **Ratiba 5 rahisi** inayofaa shule na nyumbani
- **Vidokezo vya WHO** kwa lugha ya kawaida
- **Suluhisho la matatizo** kama mama anavyoyajua

### Vidokezo 5 vya Usalama Jikoni
1. **Kata chakula vipande vidogo** – epuka kukaba
2. **Epuka karanga nzima, popcorn, zabibu**
3. **Pika vizuri** – nyama iwe laini
4. **Osha mikono na vyombo**
5. **Hifadhi chakula baridi**

**Kila kijiko ni upendo. Kila tabasamu ni thawabu.**

Virutubisho 7 vya Msingi.content:
![Child Nutrition Pyramid](https://www.mayoclinic.org/-/media/kcms/gbs/patient-consumer/images/2023/08/school-age-nutrition-pyramid.jpg)

### 1. **Iron (8–10 mg/siku)**
- **Hufanya nini?** Hubeba oksijeni, husaidia kufikiri
- **Wapi?** Nyama nyekundu, kuku, dengu, mchicha
- **Jinsi ya kula?** Na limau au nyanya – iron inaingia haraka

### 2. **Calcium (1000 mg/siku)**
- **Hufanya nini?** Huimarisha mifupa na meno
- **Wapi?** Maziwa, yogurt, dagaa, mchicha

### 3. **Vitamin D (600 IU/siku)**
- **Hufanya nini?** Husaidia kunyonya calcium
- **Wapi?** Maziwa, mayai, **jua la asubuhi dakika 15**

### 4. **Protein (19–25 g/siku)**
- **Hufanya nini?** Huimarisha misuli na ukuaji
- **Wapi?** Mayai, kuku, maharagwe, karanga iliyosagwa

### 5. **Omega-3 (DHA)**
- **Hufanya nini?** Huimarisha akili na macho
- **Wapi?** Samaki, mbegu za chia, karanga za walnut

### 6. **Vitamin A**
- **Hufanya nini?** Husaidia macho na kinga
- **Wapi?** Karoti, chungwa, mchicha, mayai

### 7. **Fiber (25 g/siku)**
- **Hufanya nini?** Huzuia tumbo kuuma
- **Wapi?** Matunda, wali wa kahawia, mboga

![Food Sources for Kids](https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/baby/weaning-and-feeding/images/school-age-food-sources.jpg)

**Kila rangi kwenye sahani ni zawadi kwa mtoto wako.**

Chakula cha Kila Siku.content:
![Family Dinner with Child](https://www.babycenter.com/ims/2023/05/family-dinner-with-school-child-4x3.jpg)

### Chakula cha Familia – Rahisi na cha Kupendeza
- **Wali au ugali** – na mchuzi wa nyama au mboga
- **Mboga za majani** – mchicha, matembele, kabichi
- **Matunda** – ndizi, embe, chungwa, nanasi
- **Protini** – kuku, samaki, dengu, mayai
- **Maziwa** – glasi moja asubuhi, moja jioni

### Vidokezo 5 vya Kula Pamoja
1. **Kula pamoja kila jioni** – hata dakika 20
2. **Zima TV, weka simu mbali**
3. **Ruhusu mtoto achague** kati ya mboga mbili
4. **Usimlazimishe** – toa nafasi, atarudi
5. **Pika kwa upendo** – ladha huathiri hamu

![Child Helping in Kitchen](https://www.healthline.com/health/parenting/images/child-helping-in-kitchen.jpg)

**Nyumba inayokula pamoja, inakua pamoja.**

Ratiba ya Kila Siku.content:
![School Child Daily Schedule](https://www.unicef.org/parenting/sites/parenting/files/2023-05/school-age-feeding-schedule.jpg)

### Miaka 5–6
| Muda       | Chakula                                      |
|------------|----------------------------------------------|
| 6:30 AM    | Maziwa 200ml + uji wa mtama + ndizi          |
| 10:00 AM   | Sandwich ya karanga + embe                   |
| 1:00 PM    | Wali + kuku + mboga + maharagwe              |
| 4:00 PM    | Yogurt 100ml + mkate wa nafaka               |
| 7:00 PM    | Ugali + samaki + saladi + maziwa 150ml       |

### Miaka 6–7
| Muda       | Chakula                                      |
|------------|----------------------------------------------|
| 6:30 AM    | Maziwa 150ml + mayai + mkate + parachichi    |
| 10:00 AM   | Matunda + biskuti za nafaka                  |
| 1:00 PM    | Wali wa kahawia + nyama + mboga + dengu      |
| 4:00 PM    | Maziwa 100ml + karanga                       |
| 7:00 PM    | Ugali + dagaa + mboga + matunda              |

### Vidokezo Rahisi
- **Maziwa 400ml/siku** – asubuhi na jioni
- **Kunywa maji** – chupa shuleni
- **Epuka juisi, soda, chai tamu**
- **Pakia chakula cha mchana** kila siku

![Lunch Box Ideas](https://www.cdc.gov/nutrition/images/school-lunch-box-ideas.jpg)

**Ratiba hii inafaa shule na nyumbani – badilisha tu!**

Vidokezo vya Wataalamu.content:
![WHO School Age Guidelines](https://www.who.int/images/default-source/health-topics/school-age-nutrition/school-age-feeding-guidelines.jpg)

### Vidokezo 10 vya WHO – Kwa Lugha ya Mama
1. **Kula pamoja kila jioni** – hata dakika 15
2. **Maziwa 400ml/siku** – hadi miaka 7
3. **Kula mara 5** – 3 chakula, 2 vitafunwa
4. **Chakula chenye rangi 5** kila siku
5. **Epuka chumvi, sukari** – tumia viungo
6. **Tumia kikombe** – sio chupa
7. **Ruhusu mtoto achague** – anajifunza
8. **Pakia chakula shuleni** – salama na chenye afya
9. **Angalia uzito** kila mwezi kliniki
10. **Cheza nje dakika 60** kila siku

### Vyakula 10 vya Kuepuka
1. Soda
2. Juisi ya pakiti
3. Chips
4. Biskuti tamu
5. Keki za dukani
6. Nyama ya kukaanga mara nyingi
7. Chakula cha mifuko
8. Dawa bila daktari
9. Kula TV mbele
10. Kulala njaa

### Dawa za Ziada
- **Vitamin D**: 600 IU/siku (ikiwa jua ni kidogo)
- **Iron**: Ikiwa anemia (daktari)

**Mtoto mwenye afya ni taifa lenye nguvu.**

Matatizo na Suluhisho.content:
![Common Child Issues](https://www.webmd.com/parenting/baby/ss/slideshow-school-age-issues.jpg)

### 1. **Mtoto Anakataa Kula**
- **Suluhisho**:
  - Kula **mara 5–6** (hata kama ni kidogo)
  - Badilisha **rangi na umbo**
  - Kula **pamoja na familia**
  - Usimlazimishe – atarudi

### 2. **Unene**
- **Suluhisho**:
  - Punguza **vyakula vya sukari**
  - Ongeza **mboga na matunda**
  - Cheza **nje dakika 60**

### 3. **Tumbo Kuuma (Kuvimbiwa)**
- **Suluhisho**:
  - Kula **papai, ndizi, embe**
  - Kunywa **maji mengi**
  - Kula **mboga za majani**

### 4. **Anemia (Uchovu)**
- **Suluhisho**:
  - Kula **nyama mara 3 kwa wiki**
  - Mchicha + limau
  - Tembea kliniki

### Jinsi ya Kujua Mtoto Anapata Virutubisho
| Miaka | Uzito (kg) | Urefu (cm) |
|-------|------------|------------|
| 5     | 16–20      | 105–115    |
| 7     | 20–27      | 118–128    |

**Matatizo yanapungua kwa upendo na chakula bora.**

### Muhtasari wa Moyo
| Miaka | Chakula Kikuu |
|-------|---------------|
| 5–7   | Chakula cha familia + maziwa 400ml |
| 7+    | Chakula cha familia pekee |

### Faida za Moyo Mkuu
- Mtoto mwenye **akili, nguvu, furaha**
- Familia yenye **upendo, amani, afya**

### Hatua 3 za Leo
1. **Andika ratiba** ya wiki hii
2. **Pakia chakula** cha mchana shuleni
3. **Kula pamoja jioni** – zima TV

**Mtoto wako ni shujaa. Chakula chako ni silaha yake. Upendo wako ni nguvu yake.**
